DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety, tolerability, and activity of NGM282 in patients with Type 2 Diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study of NGM282 in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Males or females, between 18 and 70 years of age, inclusive BMI range of 2440 kg/m2, inclusive No active coronary artery disease Resting heart rate in the range of 40100 bpm Diagnosis of Type 1 diabetes History of significant hypersensitivity, intolerance, or allergy to any drug compound, food, or other substance
